mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.building_id AS "building.id", a.floor_no AS "floorNo", a.plane_img AS "planeImg", a.video_url AS "videoUrl", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name as "building.name", a.remarks AS "remarks"
left join sys_building b on b.id = a.building_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_building_floor( id, building_id, floor_no, plane_img, video_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{building.id}, #{floorNo}, #{planeImg}, #{videoUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_building_floor SET building_id = #{building.id}, floor_no = #{floorNo}, plane_img = #{planeImg}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
